title: Designing Transparent AI Systems
speaker: Prof. Elena Ruiz (University of Madrid)
description: Prof. Ruiz will cover design principles and practical evaluations of AI transparency tooling in safety-critical workflows.

title: Edge Intelligence for Smart Manufacturing
speaker: Dr. Marcus Feld (TechForge Labs)
description: Dr. Feld discusses lessons from deploying edge analytics platforms across factories and highlights open research problems.

title: Collaborative Robotics in Healthcare
speaker: Dr. Noriko Tanaka (Osaka Robotics Center)
description: Dr. Tanaka shares clinical case studies illustrating how collaborative robots improve patient outcomes and staff safety.
